entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of showers this evening then 30 percent chance of showers after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
